activities.name: Vocabulary Flash Cards
activities.description: Practice vocabulary using digital flash cards
activities.instructions: Click on the card to flip between Nepali and English. Mark yourself correct or incorrect to track progress.

activities.name: Word Matching
activities.description: Match Nepali words with their English translations
activities.instructions: Draw lines between matching pairs of Nepali and English words.

activities.name: Spelling Practice
activities.description: Practice spelling Nepali words in romanized form
activities.instructions: Listen to or read the Nepali word and type its romanized spelling.
